text: E'i karane'i bani icharaa'ilara babe e'i bidhana dichilo ye, hatyara paraibarte na'iba prthiraita asanti srsti raodha karaara bahirae yadi konoba'i karaobaka hatya karae si yeniba samagra manara jatikahe hatya karaile arau yiye karaobara praana raksa karaile si yeniba samagra manuhara praana raksa karaile. Niscaya sihamtara ocarata amara raachulasakala spasta pramanadi lai ahichila, iyara pichato sihamtara adhikansa'i prthiraita simalanghana karaichila
